name: Qualia's Sweets Craft
description:
This game is a cute 2D action puzzle game!
The main character is a witch named "Qualia".

It looks like an orthodox 2D action game, but you can't control Qualia.
She just moves forward automatically.
Instead, you control Qualia's familiar spirits with the mouse.
You can make blocks appear and disappear.
Let's lead Qualia to the goal!
